nodes.text: Friendship in the Order is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force adventure Twi'light Storm. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on February 6 2003 and took the form of an interview with Master Lanius Qel-Bertuk on how attachment and friendship fit with the Jedi concept of non-attachment. An excerpt of this conversation was later quoted in Jedi vs. Sith: The Essential Guide to the Force.
